=======================
📦 Simple Calculator Module
=======================

This module provides basic arithmetic operations and is defined inside the __init__.py file, making it suitable as a package initializer or standalone utility.

------------
📌 Functions
------------

1. add(num1, num2)
   → Returns the sum of two numbers.

2. sub(num1, num2)
   → Returns the difference of num1 and num2.

3. mul(num1, num2)
   → Returns the product of two numbers.

4. div(num1, num2)
   → Returns the division result of num1 by num2.

5. exp(num1, num2)
   → Returns num1 raised to the power of num2.

6. sqt(num1)
   → Returns the square root of num1.

---------------------
🧪 Example Usage
---------------------

print(add(7, 8))        # 15
print(div(4, 5))        # 0.8
print(exp(4, 3))        # 64
print(sqt(25))          # 5.0
